source: ## Import Pandans library for Python
import pandas as pd
## Load Source Data from BlobStorage

# The scource files are uncommented for the Productionized run (Remove the `#` when troubleshooting these scripts)

#KEY = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/DataLake/Structured/Facts/F_KEY.parquet', format='parquet')
#KEY.createOrReplaceTempView("F_KEY")

#dboOCRD = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/SAP/dboOCRD.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboOCRD.createOrReplaceTempView("dboOCRD")

#dboOCTG = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/SAP/dboOCTG.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboOCTG.createOrReplaceTempView("dboOCTG")
## Load Excel Source file from Blobstorage

# Load EXCEL with Customer Master Data

# Variables
var_File_Path = "abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Excel_Files/Customer Master Data.xlsx"
var_File_Page = "Customer Master"

# Processing
excel_file = pd.ExcelFile(var_File_Path)
excel_file_page = pd.read_excel(excel_file, var_File_Page)
excel_file_Dataframe = spark.createDataFrame(excel_file_page)

excel_file_Dataframe.createOrReplaceTempView("Customer_Master_Data")

Customer_Master_Data = spark.sql("""SELECT `Customer Code`, `Company`, `Customer Group`, `Customer Type` FROM Customer_Master_Data""")

Customer_Master_Data.createOrReplaceTempView("Customer_Master_Data")
## Load Excel Source file from Blobstorage

# Load EXCEL with RevenueByCustomerMapping

# Variables
var_File_Path = "abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Excel_Files/RevenueByCustomerMapping.xlsx"
var_File_Page = "RevByCustMap"

# Processing
excel_file = pd.ExcelFile(var_File_Path)
excel_file_page = pd.read_excel(excel_file, var_File_Page)
excel_file_Dataframe = spark.createDataFrame(excel_file_page)

excel_file_Dataframe.createOrReplaceTempView("RevenueByCustomerMapping")

RevenueByCustomerMapping = spark.sql("""SELECT `Customer Code KEY`, Company, `Customer Name`, `Customer Group Name`, `Customer Revenue Type`, `Customer Sales Rep` FROM RevenueByCustomerMapping""")

RevenueByCustomerMapping.createOrReplaceTempView("RevenueByCustomerMapping")
## Start of QView scripting translated over to MSSQL for Dim_Customer Table

Key = spark.sql("""
SELECT DISTINCT Customer_Code_KEY
FROM F_Key
""")
#Key.show()
Key.createOrReplaceTempView("Key")

Business_Partner = spark.sql("""
SELECT CardCode || "City Logistics New" AS `Customer_Code_KEY`,
	CardCode AS `Customer_Code1`, 
       UPPER(CardName) AS Customer1, 
       CardType AS `Customer_Type_Code1`, 
       GroupCode AS `Customer_Group_Code1`,
       U_BEE AS `Customer_BEE_Score1`, 
       GroupNum AS `Customer_Terms_Code`,
       "City Logistics New" as Company
FROM dboOCRD
""")
#Business_Partner.show()
Business_Partner.createOrReplaceTempView("Business_Partner")

CUSTOMER = spark.sql("""
SELECT k.Customer_Code_KEY,
       bp.Customer_Code1,
       bp.Customer1,
       bp.Customer_Type_Code1,
       bp.Customer_Group_Code1,
       bp.Customer_BEE_Score1,
       bp.Customer_Terms_Code,
       bp.Company
FROM Key k
LEFT JOIN Business_Partner bp
ON k.Customer_Code_KEY = bp.Customer_Code_KEY
""")
#CUSTOMER.show()
CUSTOMER.createOrReplaceTempView("CUSTOMER")

Customer_Master_Data = spark.sql("""
SELECT `Customer Code` || Company AS `Customer_Code_KEY`, 
     `Customer Group`, 
     `Customer Type`
FROM Customer_Master_Data
""")
#Customer_Master_Data.show()
Customer_Master_Data.createOrReplaceTempView("Customer_Master_Data")

CUSTOMER = spark.sql("""
SELECT c.*,
       cmd.`Customer Group` as Customer_Group,
       cmd.`Customer Type` as Customer_Type
FROM CUSTOMER c
LEFT JOIN Customer_Master_Data cmd
ON c.Customer_Code_KEY = cmd.Customer_Code_KEY
""")
#CUSTOMER.show()
CUSTOMER.createOrReplaceTempView("CUSTOMER")

Payment_Terms = spark.sql("""
SELECT GroupNum as `Customer_Terms_Code`, 
       PymntGroup as `Customer_Terms1`, 
       "City Logistics New" as Company
FROM dboOCTG
""")
#Payment_Terms.show
Payment_Terms.createOrReplaceTempView("Payment_Terms")

CUSTOMER = spark.sql("""
SELECT c.*, pt.Customer_Terms1
FROM CUSTOMER c
LEFT JOIN Payment_Terms pt
       ON c.Customer_Terms_Code = pt.Customer_Terms_Code
""")
#CUSTOMER.show()
CUSTOMER.createOrReplaceTempView("CUSTOMER")

RevenueByCustomerMapping = spark.sql("""
SELECT `Customer Code KEY`,
		`Customer Name`,
		`Company`,
		`Customer Group Name`,
		`Customer Revenue Type`,
		`Customer Sales Rep`
FROM RevenueByCustomerMapping
""")
#RevenueByCustomerMapping.show()
RevenueByCustomerMapping.createOrReplaceTempView("RevenueByCustomerMapping")

CUSTOMER = spark.sql("""
SELECT c.*,
	   rbcm.`Customer Name` as Customer_Name,
       rbcm.`Customer Group Name` as Customer_Group_Name,
	   rbcm.`Customer Revenue Type` as Customer_Revenue_Type,
	   rbcm.`Customer Sales Rep` as Customer_Sales_Rep
FROM CUSTOMER c
LEFT JOIN RevenueByCustomerMapping rbcm
ON c.Customer_Code_KEY = rbcm.`Customer Code KEY`
""")
#CUSTOMER.show()
CUSTOMER.createOrReplaceTempView("CUSTOMER")

CUSTOMER_Expose = spark.sql("""
SELECT Customer_Code_KEY,
       Company,
       Customer,
       Customer_Type_Code,
       Customer_Group_Code,
       Customer_BEE_Score,
       Customer_Group, 
       Customer_Type,
       Customer_Terms_Code,
       Customer_Terms,
       Customer_Name,
       Customer_Group_Name,
       Customer_Revenue_Type,
       Customer_Sales_Rep
FROM CUSTOMER
""")
#CUSTOMER_Expose.show()
CUSTOMER_Expose.createOrReplaceTempView("CUSTOMER_Expose")
## Write success message for production script
print("Scripts have successfully executed")
